title: Public Service Management Act 1997 (No. 27 of 1997), hereby order as
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Advisers
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Advisers 

(Minister of State at the Department of Justice) Order 2023.
text_norm: 1 order may cited appointment special adviser (minister state department justice) order 2023

title: Public Service Management Act 1997 (No. 27 of 1997), hereby order as
heading: 2. Mr Adam Ledwith, particular of whose address has been deposited at
text_raw:
2. Mr Adam Ledwith, particular of whose address has been deposited at 
the offices of the Department of Justice, 51 St. Stephen’s Green, Dublin 2, is 
appointed to be a Special Adviser to the Minister of State at the Department of 
Justice with effect from 22 August 2023. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

7 December, 2023. 

LEO VARADKAR, 

Taoiseach. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 12th December, 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [632] 3
